<<<<<<< HEAD
The amours of Bonne Sforza, queen of Polonia. Les amours de Bonne Sforza, reigne de Pologne. English. Belon, P. (Peter)
[12], 155, [1] p.
Printed by T.M. for R. Bently in Covent-Garden, London : 1684.
A translation of: Les amours de Bonne Sforza, reigne de Pologne. Dedication signed: P.B., i.e. Peter Bellon. Identified as Wing B1849 on reel 83:2. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 83:2) and the Harvard University Library (reel 1772:11).
=======
The amours of Bonne Sforza, queen of Polonia. Les amours de Bonne Sforza, reigne de Pologne. English. Belon, P. (Peter)
[12], 155, [1] p.
Printed by T.M. for R. Bently in Covent-Garden, London : 1684.
A translation of: Les amours de Bonne Sforza, reigne de Pologne. Dedication signed: P.B., i.e. Peter Bellon. Identified as Wing B1849 on reel 83:2. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 83:2) and the Harvard University Library (reel 1772:11).
R. Bently
T.M.
Covent-Garden
